title: Event trigger
description: An event trigger which runs actions when a matching event is received from a component

target.title: Target component
target.description: Type of component which sent event

event.title: Event name
event.description: Event name. Multiple event names may be given by joining them with '|'

*.title: Parameter value
*.description: Parameter value. Multiple accepted values may be given by joining them with '|'

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: The actions which should run when the event is triggered
